Text: My Son if I Could Have One Wish in All the World from MomHello Mom has just sent you a greeting card from Bluemountaincom You can pick up your personal message here cardsboxbraacpyxxsuhtml Your card will be available for the next days This service is FREE Have a good day and have fun Accessing your card indicates agreement with Blue Mountains Website Rules homeWebsiteRuleshtml Send FREE Blue Mountain cards to friends and family and attach gifts too

FYIHappy Birthday Marty I hope you have a good day and a wonderful evening too I sent you an ecard a while ago I found out yesterday that I have to be in DC the week of November Im still up in the air about what days Ill go to Arkansas and will only stay one or two nights Ill probably stay with Mother and Caroline I did find a list of the bathhouses in Hot Springs where you can get a massage so Id love to have one Ill talk with you later Mom

TicketsThe email tickets came through almost immediately after I hung up the telephone I didnt have any problem printing them THANKS SO MUCH This is special and Im really looking forward to it Love Mom
